games.name: Portal 2
games.description: A puzzle-platform game that challenges you with mind-bending puzzles.

games.name: Resident Evil 2
games.description: A survival horror game set in the aftermath of a deadly virus outbreak.

games.name: Hollow Knight
games.description: An action-adventure game set in a beautifully hand-drawn mysterious world.

games.name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
games.description: A game where you seek revenge on your foes in late 1500s Sengoku Japan.

games.name: Firewatch
games.description: A single-player first-person mystery set in the Wyoming wilderness.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Live as a legendary Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory.

games.name: Final Fantasy XV
games.description: Embark on an epic journey with your friends to reclaim your homeland.

games.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
games.description: A free-to-play battle royale game where you fight to be the last one standing.

games.name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition
games.description: A classic strategy game remastered in full HD with new features.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: A fast-paced, competitive online game that blends the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements.
